casebody.data:
D. STANLEY MATTHEWS et al. v. FREDERICK POHLMYER [No. 64,

October Term, 1934.]

Decided January 16, 1935.

The cause was ar-gued before Bond, C.J., Urner, Offutt, Parke, and Sloan, JJ.

Samuel J. Aaron, with whom were Howard L. Aaron and Jack M. Fox on the brief, for the appellants. Charles F. Obrecht and Lester H. Crowther, with whom were Obrecht & Baumann on the brief, for the appellee. Bond, C.J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
